00065 "{\n"
00066 "       float4 a1 = mymake_float4(a.xyz,0.f);\n"
00067 "       float4 b1 = mymake_float4(b.xyz,0.f);\n"

00069 "}\n"

00081 "typedef struct\n"
00082 "{\n"
00083 "       float4 m_row[3];\n"
00084 "}Matrix3x3;\n"
00085 "__inline\n"
00086 "float4 mtMul1(Matrix3x3 a, float4 b);\n"
00087 "__inline\n"
00088 "float4 mtMul3(float4 a, Matrix3x3 b);\n"
00089 "__inline\n"
00090 "float4 mtMul1(Matrix3x3 a, float4 b)\n"
00091 "{\n"
00092 "       float4 ans;\n"
00093 "       ans.x = dot3F4( a.m_row[0], b );\n"
00094 "       ans.y = dot3F4( a.m_row[1], b );\n"
00095 "       ans.z = dot3F4( a.m_row[2], b );\n"
00096 "       ans.w = 0.f;\n"
00097 "       return ans;\n"
00098 "}\n"
00099 "__inline\n"
00100 "float4 mtMul3(float4 a, Matrix3x3 b)\n"
00101 "{\n"
00102 "       float4 colx = mymake_float4(b.m_row[0].x, b.m_row[1].x, b.m_row[2].x, 0);\n"
00103 "       float4 coly = mymake_float4(b.m_row[0].y, b.m_row[1].y, b.m_row[2].y, 0);\n"
00104 "       float4 colz = mymake_float4(b.m_row[0].z, b.m_row[1].z, b.m_row[2].z, 0);\n"
00105 "       float4 ans;\n"
00106 "       ans.x = dot3F4( a, colx );\n"
00107 "       ans.y = dot3F4( a, coly );\n"
00108 "       ans.z = dot3F4( a, colz );\n"
00109 "       return ans;\n"
00110 "}\n"

00163 "void setLinearAndAngular( float4 n, float4 r0, float4 r1, float4* linear, float4* angular0, float4* angular1);\n"
00164 "void setLinearAndAngular( float4 n, float4 r0, float4 r1, float4* linear, float4* angular0, float4* angular1)\n"
00165 "{\n"
00166 "       *linear = mymake_float4(-n.xyz,0.f);\n"
00167 "       *angular0 = -cross3(r0, n);\n"
00168 "       *angular1 = cross3(r1, n);\n"
00169 "}\n"
00170 "float calcRelVel( float4 l0, float4 l1, float4 a0, float4 a1, float4 linVel0, float4 angVel0, float4 linVel1, float4 angVel1 );\n"
00171 "float calcRelVel( float4 l0, float4 l1, float4 a0, float4 a1, float4 linVel0, float4 angVel0, float4 linVel1, float4 angVel1 )\n"
00172 "{\n"
00173 "       return dot3F4(l0, linVel0) + dot3F4(a0, angVel0) + dot3F4(l1, linVel1) + dot3F4(a1, angVel1);\n"
00174 "}\n"
00175 "float calcJacCoeff(const float4 linear0, const float4 linear1, const float4 angular0, const float4 angular1,\n"
00176 "                                  float invMass0, const Matrix3x3* invInertia0, float invMass1, const Matrix3x3* invInertia1);\n"
00177 "float calcJacCoeff(const float4 linear0, const float4 linear1, const float4 angular0, const float4 angular1,\n"
00178 "                                       float invMass0, const Matrix3x3* invInertia0, float invMass1, const Matrix3x3* invInertia1)\n"
00179 "{\n"
00180 "       //      linear0,1 are normlized\n"
00181 "       float jmj0 = invMass0;//dot3F4(linear0, linear0)*invMass0;\n"
00182 "       float jmj1 = dot3F4(mtMul3(angular0,*invInertia0), angular0);\n"
00183 "       float jmj2 = invMass1;//dot3F4(linear1, linear1)*invMass1;\n"
00184 "       float jmj3 = dot3F4(mtMul3(angular1,*invInertia1), angular1);\n"
00185 "       return -1.f/(jmj0+jmj1+jmj2+jmj3);\n"
00186 "}\n"
00187 "void solveContact(__global Constraint4* cs,\n"
00188 "                                 float4 posA, float4* linVelA, float4* angVelA, float invMassA, Matrix3x3 invInertiaA,\n"
00189 "                                 float4 posB, float4* linVelB, float4* angVelB, float invMassB, Matrix3x3 invInertiaB);\n"
00190 "void solveContact(__global Constraint4* cs,\n"
00191 "                       float4 posA, float4* linVelA, float4* angVelA, float invMassA, Matrix3x3 invInertiaA,\n"
00192 "                       float4 posB, float4* linVelB, float4* angVelB, float invMassB, Matrix3x3 invInertiaB)\n"
00193 "{\n"
00194 "       float minRambdaDt = 0;\n"
00195 "       float maxRambdaDt = FLT_MAX;\n"
00196 "       for(int ic=0; ic<4; ic++)\n"
00197 "       {\n"
00198 "               if( cs->m_jacCoeffInv[ic] == 0.f ) continue;\n"
00199 "               float4 angular0, angular1, linear;\n"
00200 "               float4 r0 = cs->m_worldPos[ic] - posA;\n"
00201 "               float4 r1 = cs->m_worldPos[ic] - posB;\n"
00202 "               setLinearAndAngular( -cs->m_linear, r0, r1, &linear, &angular0, &angular1 );\n"
00203 "               float rambdaDt = calcRelVel( cs->m_linear, -cs->m_linear, angular0, angular1, \n"
00204 "                       *linVelA, *angVelA, *linVelB, *angVelB ) + cs->m_b[ic];\n"
00205 "               rambdaDt *= cs->m_jacCoeffInv[ic];\n"
00206 "               {\n"
00207 "                       float prevSum = cs->m_appliedRambdaDt[ic];\n"
00208 "                       float updated = prevSum;\n"
00209 "                       updated += rambdaDt;\n"
00210 "                       updated = max2( updated, minRambdaDt );\n"
00211 "                       updated = min2( updated, maxRambdaDt );\n"
00212 "                       rambdaDt = updated - prevSum;\n"
00213 "                       cs->m_appliedRambdaDt[ic] = updated;\n"
00214 "               }\n"
00215 "               float4 linImp0 = invMassA*linear*rambdaDt;\n"
00216 "               float4 linImp1 = invMassB*(-linear)*rambdaDt;\n"
00217 "               float4 angImp0 = mtMul1(invInertiaA, angular0)*rambdaDt;\n"
00218 "               float4 angImp1 = mtMul1(invInertiaB, angular1)*rambdaDt;\n"
00219 "               *linVelA += linImp0;\n"
00220 "               *angVelA += angImp0;\n"
00221 "               *linVelB += linImp1;\n"
00222 "               *angVelB += angImp1;\n"
00223 "       }\n"
00224 "}\n"
00225 "void btPlaneSpace1 (const float4* n, float4* p, float4* q);\n"
00226 " void btPlaneSpace1 (const float4* n, float4* p, float4* q)\n"
00227 "{\n"
00228 "  if (fabs(n[0].z) > 0.70710678f) {\n"
00229 "    // choose p in y-z plane\n"
00230 "    float a = n[0].y*n[0].y + n[0].z*n[0].z;\n"
00231 "    float k = 1.f/sqrt(a);\n"
00232 "    p[0].x = 0;\n"
00233 "       p[0].y = -n[0].z*k;\n"
00234 "       p[0].z = n[0].y*k;\n"
00235 "    // set q = n x p\n"
00236 "    q[0].x = a*k;\n"
00237 "       q[0].y = -n[0].x*p[0].z;\n"
00238 "       q[0].z = n[0].x*p[0].y;\n"
00239 "  }\n"
00240 "  else {\n"
00241 "    // choose p in x-y plane\n"
00242 "    float a = n[0].x*n[0].x + n[0].y*n[0].y;\n"
00243 "    float k = 1.f/sqrt(a);\n"
00244 "    p[0].x = -n[0].y*k;\n"
00245 "       p[0].y = n[0].x*k;\n"
00246 "       p[0].z = 0;\n"
00247 "    // set q = n x p\n"
00248 "    q[0].x = -n[0].z*p[0].y;\n"
00249 "       q[0].y = n[0].z*p[0].x;\n"
00250 "       q[0].z = a*k;\n"
00251 "  }\n"
00252 "}\n"
00253 "void solveContactConstraint(__global Body* gBodies, __global Shape* gShapes, __global Constraint4* ldsCs);\n"
00254 "void solveContactConstraint(__global Body* gBodies, __global Shape* gShapes, __global Constraint4* ldsCs)\n"
00255 "{\n"
00256 "       //float frictionCoeff = ldsCs[0].m_linear.w;\n"
00257 "       int aIdx = ldsCs[0].m_bodyA;\n"
00258 "       int bIdx = ldsCs[0].m_bodyB;\n"
00259 "       float4 posA = gBodies[aIdx].m_pos;\n"
00260 "       float4 linVelA = gBodies[aIdx].m_linVel;\n"
00261 "       float4 angVelA = gBodies[aIdx].m_angVel;\n"
00262 "       float invMassA = gBodies[aIdx].m_invMass;\n"
00263 "       Matrix3x3 invInertiaA = gShapes[aIdx].m_invInertia;\n"
00264 "       float4 posB = gBodies[bIdx].m_pos;\n"
00265 "       float4 linVelB = gBodies[bIdx].m_linVel;\n"
00266 "       float4 angVelB = gBodies[bIdx].m_angVel;\n"
00267 "       float invMassB = gBodies[bIdx].m_invMass;\n"
00268 "       Matrix3x3 invInertiaB = gShapes[bIdx].m_invInertia;\n"
00269 "       solveContact( ldsCs, posA, &linVelA, &angVelA, invMassA, invInertiaA,\n"
00270 "                       posB, &linVelB, &angVelB, invMassB, invInertiaB );\n"
00271 "  if (gBodies[aIdx].m_invMass)\n"
00272 "  {\n"
00273 "               gBodies[aIdx].m_linVel = linVelA;\n"
00274 "               gBodies[aIdx].m_angVel = angVelA;\n"
00275 "       } else\n"
00276 "       {\n"
00277 "               gBodies[aIdx].m_linVel = mymake_float4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00278 "               gBodies[aIdx].m_angVel = mymake_float4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00279 "       \n"
00280 "       }\n"
00281 "       if (gBodies[bIdx].m_invMass)\n"
00282 "  {\n"
00283 "               gBodies[bIdx].m_linVel = linVelB;\n"
00284 "               gBodies[bIdx].m_angVel = angVelB;\n"
00285 "       } else\n"
00286 "       {\n"
00287 "               gBodies[bIdx].m_linVel = mymake_float4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00288 "               gBodies[bIdx].m_angVel = mymake_float4(0,0,0,0);\n"
00289 "       \n"
00290 "       }\n"
00291 "}\n"

00293 "{\n"
00294 "       int m_valInt0;\n"
00295 "       int m_valInt1;\n"
00296 "       int m_valInt2;\n"
00297 "       int m_valInt3;\n"
00298 "       float m_val0;\n"
00299 "       float m_val1;\n"
00300 "       float m_val2;\n"
00301 "       float m_val3;\n"
00302 "} SolverDebugInfo;\n"
00303 "__kernel\n"
00304 "__attribute__((reqd_work_group_size(WG_SIZE,1,1)))\n"
00305 "void BatchSolveKernelContact(__global Body* gBodies,\n"
00306 "                      __global Shape* gShapes,\n"
00307 "                      __global Constraint4* gConstraints,\n"
00308 "                      __global int* gN,\n"
00309 "                      __global int* gOffsets,\n"
00310 "                      __global int* batchSizes,\n"
00311 "                       int maxBatch1,\n"
00312 "                       int cellBatch,\n"
00313 "                       int4 nSplit\n"
00314 "                      )\n"
00315 "{\n"
00316 "       //__local int ldsBatchIdx[WG_SIZE+1];\n"
00317 "       __local int ldsCurBatch;\n"
00318 "       __local int ldsNextBatch;\n"
00319 "       __local int ldsStart;\n"
00320 "       int lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00321 "       int wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00322 "//     int gIdx = GET_GLOBAL_IDX;\n"
00323 "//     debugInfo[gIdx].m_valInt0 = gIdx;\n"
00324 "       //debugInfo[gIdx].m_valInt1 = GET_GROUP_SIZE;\n"
00325 "       \n"
00326 "       \n"
00327 "       int zIdx = (wgIdx/((nSplit.x*nSplit.y)/4))*2+((cellBatch&4)>>2);\n"
00328 "       int remain= (wgIdx%((nSplit.x*nSplit.y)/4));\n"
00329 "       int yIdx = (remain/(nSplit.x/2))*2 + ((cellBatch&2)>>1);\n"
00330 "       int xIdx = (remain%(nSplit.x/2))*2 + (cellBatch&1);\n"
00331 "       int cellIdx = xIdx+yIdx*nSplit.x+zIdx*(nSplit.x*nSplit.y);\n"
00332 "       //int xIdx = (wgIdx/(nSplit/2))*2 + (bIdx&1);\n"
00333 "       //int yIdx = (wgIdx%(nSplit/2))*2 + (bIdx>>1);\n"
00334 "       //int cellIdx = xIdx+yIdx*nSplit;\n"
00335 "       \n"
00336 "       if( gN[cellIdx] == 0 ) \n"
00337 "               return;\n"
00338 "       int maxBatch = batchSizes[cellIdx];\n"
00339 "       \n"
00340 "       \n"
00341 "       const int start = gOffsets[cellIdx];\n"
00342 "       const int end = start + gN[cellIdx];\n"
00343 "       \n"
00344 "       \n"
00345 "       \n"
00346 "       if( lIdx == 0 )\n"
00347 "       {\n"
00348 "               ldsCurBatch = 0;\n"
00349 "               ldsNextBatch = 0;\n"
00350 "               ldsStart = start;\n"
00351 "       }\n"
00352 "       GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00353 "       int idx=ldsStart+lIdx;\n"
00354 "       while (ldsCurBatch < maxBatch)\n"
00355 "       {\n"
00356 "               for(; idx<end; )\n"
00357 "               {\n"
00358 "                       if (gConstraints[idx].m_batchIdx == ldsCurBatch)\n"
00359 "                       {\n"
00360 "                                       solveContactConstraint( gBodies, gShapes, &gConstraints[idx] );\n"
00361 "                                idx+=64;\n"
00362 "                       } else\n"
00363 "                       {\n"
00364 "                               break;\n"
00365 "                       }\n"
00366 "               }\n"
00367 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00368 "       \n"
00369 "               if( lIdx == 0 )\n"
00370 "               {\n"
00371 "                       ldsCurBatch++;\n"
00372 "               }\n"
00373 "               GROUP_LDS_BARRIER;\n"
00374 "       }\n"
00375 "       \n"
00376 "    \n"
00377 "}\n"
00378 "__kernel void solveSingleContactKernel(__global Body* gBodies,\n"
00379 "                      __global Shape* gShapes,\n"
00380 "                      __global Constraint4* gConstraints,\n"
00381 "                       int cellIdx,\n"
00382 "                       int batchOffset,\n"
00383 "                       int numConstraintsInBatch\n"
00384 "                      )\n"
00385 "{\n"
00386 "       int index = get_global_id(0);\n"
00387 "       if (index < numConstraintsInBatch)\n"
00388 "       {\n"
00389 "               int idx=batchOffset+index;\n"
00390 "               solveContactConstraint( gBodies, gShapes, &gConstraints[idx] );\n"
00391 "       }    \n"
00392 "}\n"
